items.title: Jim Cramer on Caterpillar Inc. (CAT): ‘Critics Proven Wrong as Growth Prospects Brighten’
items.description: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Reveals Trump’s Potential Secret Weapon In China Trade Talks & Discusses These 10 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer recently discussed. In a recent appearance on CNBC’s Squawk on the […]

items.title: Terex Q1 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Decline Y/Y on Low Volumes
items.description: TEX witnesses year-over-year decline in Q1 earnings due to low volumes. Its guidance for 2025 earnings per share of $4.70 - $5.10 suggests a 20% decline at the midpoint.

items.title: 2024 Total Dividend Income And Portfolio Update
items.description: 2024 also saw some changes to some of my holdings as the author shuttled several dividend income payers for higher return crypto plays. Click to read.

items.title: 1 Dow Jones Stock with Impressive Fundamentals and 2 to Be Wary Of
items.description: The Dow Jones (^DJI) is made up of 30 of the most established and influential companies in the market. But even blue-chip stocks can struggle - some are dealing with slowing growth, outdated business models, or increasing competition.
